website_summaries.verdict: One of the few electronic turkey calls that offers other wildlife sounds too. Can add up to 24 more calls from online digital sound libraries.
pros: Speaker-controller combination produces loud, clear calls
Includes 24 high-quality calls, from wolves to woodpeckers
You can download more turkey calls of any length for extra versatility
cons: May not suit purists who prefer the challenge of pot, box, or mouth calls

customer_reviews.title: Very nice caller.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice caller. Well thought out features. Downloadable calls from icotec website are really nice and easy to do. 24 calls per sd card is plenty and you can arrange them in he order you want. Can have as many sd cards as you want so you can have as many calls as you want. Unit is small and calls are surprisingly loud and clear. Remote seems to work well. Only wish it came with a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Kronoshek

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this caller
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this caller. Has good sounds and stoarage space. It also has a great variety of sounds, which can come in handy. We are going to try and use the sd card feature and add sounds from MFK game calls. We have used it in the rain and the rubber seals are not the best we had to tape them shut but have had no other problems.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: great for deer
customer_reviews.text: I have had this call for two deer seasons and it is still great.. I make my own deer calls. I get from different sources. Youtube and other deer sounds... I use it in the rain a lot too and never a problem.. I wouldn't stick it in a bucket of water...It's good for any game you are hunting...Now remember this is a electronic call and for some game it is illegal to use for them.. Check your state laws...I replace my batteries the first of the season and then about half way thought the season..I have got over 500 yards in range with this call.. Oh yes,, This call works on different sound format too...
customer_reviews.author: Charles Bryson

customer_reviews.title: I must have bad luck. I bought a different brand first and ...
customer_reviews.text: I must have bad luck. I bought a different brand first and was completely disappointed in the range of the remote, it was terrible. Then I bought this one and was really impressed with the range on the remote. it was great! Only problem is this one is not loud. On a semi windy day this thing can hardly be heard on the loudest setting!!! I then bought an external speaker which I tested and it was way louder, only problem is the Icotec won't play to a non ICOtech speaker. Maybe i should just cut my losses and just trap coyotes, this thing is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: Downloading and replacing calls is simple and straightforward.
customer_reviews.text: Received call quickly and came packaged adequately without unnecessary trash. Unit appears to get loud enough but as haven’t had time to test in the field. Downloading and replacing calls from the ICOTec was simple and straight forward. I decided to keep a file of “as delivered” and considering getting more sad cards and creating libraries of like calls as needed. I would recommend this product as of now but as I said I haven’t used it hunting yet. I will modify this review if my opinion changes after using in field.
customer_reviews.author: W in Joaquin Tx

customer_reviews.title: it has terrific volume, the remote works out to 250 yards
customer_reviews.text: This game call is the real deal for the money! it has terrific volume, the remote works out to 250 yards. Quality is good .you cannot find a better value for game calls costing twice the amount of money !
customer_reviews.author: DUANE BENAMATI

customer_reviews.title: didn not come with a A 23 battery so the remote is WORTHLESS without it.
customer_reviews.text: didn not come with a A 23 battery so the remote is WORTHLESS without it!!!!!!!!!!!!! I can Not evaluate the product without it period. So what if I put in the AA batteries and it sounds good. What use is without the remote working..oh yea..no battery. Now I have to order the stupid part and wait. Don"t buy it without the battery!!!!
customer_reviews.author: XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Great value caller
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed taking this call out of the box and starting it up for the first time. Small and light weight for easy carry. Puts out plenty of sound volume. Will definitely have to load more coyote calls to replace bobcat, deer, turkey, and goose calls.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: the unit is easy to program (there's a youtube video if needed)
customer_reviews.text: I use the ICOtec GC 350 as an audiolure for attracting migratory owls in a research project. the unit is easy to program (there's a youtube video if needed), and the sound quality and volume is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Super Chinsy. The speaker was wobbly right out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Not well made for the price. Super Chinsy. The speaker was wobbly right out of the box leaving a huge gap. definitely not water resistant. This feels like a $10 kids toy made out of cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: V. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Caller
customer_reviews.text: Caller works great. Some of the reviews claim the sound volume is low. I find this unit to be quite loud. The sounds were easy to download from their website and copy to spare SD cards as long as you followed their simple directions.
customer_reviews.author: Russell F

customer_reviews.title: memory card reader broke
customer_reviews.text: So its an effective product, its loud, and the calls actually work. Looks pretty sturdy from the outside, but the electronics inside apparently cant handle the outdoors, because the memory card reader on this broke, so I couldnt add bird calls into it, which is what i purchased this for in the first place. I wish it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Arbab Khan

customer_reviews.title: ICOtec GC 350
customer_reviews.text: Excellent call. I liked that you could very easily customize memory cards with the sounds you want. And you could have different cards for different hunting conditions. I bought the model without the decoy port but I think if I were to do it again I would get the decoy attachment too.
customer_reviews.author: Tony212

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Called in crows within 5 minutes of setting it up, used the fighting owl & crow sound. Also had another owl hooting back to us for about 10 minutes which really got the crows wound up. Awesome sound quality. Will recommend this to others ASAP. Thanx !!!!
customer_reviews.author: MRHB

customer_reviews.title: Handheld portion of the unit needs work
customer_reviews.text: The handheld transmitter buttons are too easily pressed and make unwanted sounds that can ruin your hunt. Even with the handheld unit turned off, it will happen anyway. The on/off button on the transmitter slides up and down way too easily and will turn on while in your pocket and drain the batteries. The sounds are OK and I have called in coyotes
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Spanjer

customer_reviews.title: Nice call
customer_reviews.text: I can’t imagine the more expensive ones working any better than this one. I’ve put batteries in it once and have taken it out for 4 hunts and not changed them yet. It’s very loud but Easily adjustable with the remote. 5 stars! Get an A23 battery for the remote however. The call takes AA, had to go to Walmart to find the remote battery. Has 24 calls built in but you can add more through their website for free..
customer_reviews.author: David Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works best using a decoy
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I did was customize the calls loaded on the system specific for the type of predator I was after. ICOtec has their own website with free files to download and load. The call has worked awesome. I've hunted with it 5 times and every time it's brought in red foxes within 5-10 minutes, then when they see the decoy, they come running. I highly recommend this caller. It's an awesome deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: LJL

customer_reviews.title: The call works great. Has all of the range to set up ...
customer_reviews.text: The call works great. Has all of the range to set up and operate 200 yards away. The download process to add additional calls is way to complicated for a non-computer geek.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It work fine for an initial test. Put away until the season, installed fresh batteries and nothing...I’d rate it a zero if it allowed.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Loud... bought for a neighbor that made us get rid of our pets. a little hard to program sound first time if not technically savvy but clear instructions helped chugs batteries though would recommend rechargeables
customer_reviews.author: keegan h.

customer_reviews.title: It works - during peak of rut, called in young buck the first time I tried it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to lightly bump the wrong button - set off the distracted crow on an overdose call, but buck came in to the grunt two minutes later, regardless....
customer_reviews.author: Yossarian - somewhere in the Mediteranean

customer_reviews.title: I love this caller
customer_reviews.text: Low price and I have called fox, bobcat, coyote and deer in with it. I love this caller! Great range too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Mitter

customer_reviews.title: Quality appears excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact and actually louder than what I was really expecting which is great. Haven't really gotten out to do some coyote hunting but have played with it and have gotten a pack of them responding to it from afar.
customer_reviews.author: smith78884

customer_reviews.title: Buy as bundle
customer_reviews.text: Buy the decoy at the same time, they work great together.
customer_reviews.author: blp3

customer_reviews.title: Great call!
customer_reviews.text: Great call, and the sounds are authentic, unlike cheap calls. I have not used it yet, but the sounds are real good, and you can add additional sounds via the SD card.
customer_reviews.author: J D W

customer_reviews.title: Let's see who's laughing now
customer_reviews.text: My luck in the woods lately has been somewhat unproductive. Making me question my 30 plus years of hunting experience even... this thing is awesome. Loud and clear sound and more calls than id ever hope to be able to make myself. Game on tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Cody P in SW VA

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little call
customer_reviews.text: First game call purchase but in my limited experience opinion I think this little guy is pretty good. Great range, loud enough sound, got em talking in 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sulley

customer_reviews.title: Love that you can put your own calls on it ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the coolest caller ever. Love that you can put your own calls on it in mp3 format. It is super loud and clear
customer_reviews.author: JayG

customer_reviews.title: ICOtec simply the best
customer_reviews.text: High quality equipment and the company is outstanding in service. I recommend this ICOtec to all my friends.A veteran friendly company
customer_reviews.author: Ernie from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have had a very good time using the call. It is very effective
customer_reviews.author: David C. Watchorn

customer_reviews.title: Good units, a few flaws.
customer_reviews.text: GC350 "does not" play two calls at same time! Battery installation in AD400 decoy is confusing, don't install as illistrated. Reverse bottom row than reverse top row of batteries. Other than that, unit works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gill

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this call 4 times. All 4 times it has done its job and had them charging in. It called a 22 pound bobcat in shotgun range and 3 large Coyotes in to under 100 yards. It almost makes it too easy.
customer_reviews.author: DM7.62

customer_reviews.title: Good call
customer_reviews.text: Good varity of calls. Have not tried it in the field yet. Still looking for downloadable calls.
customer_reviews.author: ajmg1

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive. Get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile call. Enough volume to call in predators from a long distance. Called in a coyote within about 12 minutes of first use. Simple to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Volume level seems to be the most concern when people rate this caller bad. The volume is more than adequate for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I purchased the ICOtech. I hunt in the southeast, where hilly areas outnumber huge wide open flats. Volume level seems to be the most concern when people rate this caller bad. The volume is more than adequate for my needs, as a matter of fact, I have to be very concussion of the sound level and turn it down as coyotes and foxes work in closer.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: The way I was treated by coustmer service.
customer_reviews.text: I am a hunter I use it too call in game, and it works very well. But I just found out it is not too be used in Florida.It can be used only for small game.
customer_reviews.author: Lee C

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound !!! Every time I take it out there is some sort of action !!! Coyotes, foxes, bobcats!!! Should of bought this years ago !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike guimond

customer_reviews.title: needs more volume
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is not loud enough. I can't hear it at 125 yards
customer_reviews.author: Max Starin

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good. Still have to figure out the number-call ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good. Still have to figure out the number-call relationship.
customer_reviews.author: GM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like the caller....sound quality is great.. Great item for the money....
customer_reviews.author: shanW

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY FOR ANY HUNTER
customer_reviews.text: This unit is awesome . Sound is loud, calls are very good. works great !!!!! would definately give this a 10 out of 10. PAUL FROM WALLINGFORD CT.
customer_reviews.author: paul zambrano

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. Has good sound quality and the remote works well
customer_reviews.author: rezz93

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound very satisfied cant wait to use it on ...
customer_reviews.text: For standard delivery it got here exceptionally fast. At 2 pm I opened the package put batteries in this unit. Had it on red fox distress for not even 2 min and had a coyote almost come in the yard barkin at me... excellent sound very satisfied cant wait to use it on a night hunt
customer_reviews.author: Daniel white

customer_reviews.title: Love this call
customer_reviews.text: Love this call! Works great, batteries last a long time. It's awesome to have multiple SD cards to target different game. Very happy, customer support from ICOtec is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the sound and types of calls. Remote ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the sound and types of calls. Remote works from a long distance, have yet to test its limits.
customer_reviews.author: Allen H

customer_reviews.title: Night callin
customer_reviews.text: Works as described not sure if I will need more sounds we will see
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Caller
customer_reviews.text: Its nice and small and packs some great sound. Called in a bunch of dogs with it.
customer_reviews.author: Derick

customer_reviews.title: Great things ain't got to cost a great amount.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I'll need to call in foxes and coyotes. Very reasonably priced and the quality of the sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: doughbowlmaker

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good volume. The remote works well
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good volume. The remote works well. The preloaded sounds cover a vast array of animals, and all sound lifelike. I have really been surprised at the quality and features for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Hall

customer_reviews.title: Yotes
customer_reviews.text: Bring on the Yotes! This will call them all in!! Loud!!!
customer_reviews.author: R.Texan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and range
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, I tried from 200 metres and works excellent
customer_reviews.author: Toni Ribó Palau

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if the keypad lit up for dusk dawn opportunities
customer_reviews.text: Decent little unit. Would be nice if the keypad lit up for dusk dawn opportunities. That's probably on the $200 one.
customer_reviews.author: pring

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this caller. I've located several areas where the coyotes went crazy. Will look for a stand soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special..
customer_reviews.text: Call does not have an adequate volume and several of the calls don't sound realistic. It works, but is not anything special.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Powers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good and great price. Not super loud, but ok.
customer_reviews.author: Don P

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price it can't be beat, plus you can add accessories.
customer_reviews.author: David Conkel

customer_reviews.title: S GREAT. YOU CAN SPEND SEVERAL $100'S MORE AND NOT ...
customer_reviews.text: FOR THE PRICE IT;S GREAT. YOU CAN SPEND SEVERAL $100'S MORE AND NOT GET MUCH MORE FOR IT.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calls could have been done better - there is background noise in several calls that ...
customer_reviews.text: Calls could have been done better - there is background noise in several calls that would no be heard in the wild!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great range on remote
customer_reviews.text: This caller rocks! can't beat the price/ value. great range on remote, decent sounds even at higher output levels
customer_reviews.author: Sw1213

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was very good no problems with it!! Liked up to the reviews I had read!!!👍
customer_reviews.author: Harold Barker

customer_reviews.title: Very real calls .
customer_reviews.text: No dogs yet , called one hawk , I did an owl call and he had A serious BM .
customer_reviews.author: Jim N.

customer_reviews.title: unit seems to be a quality build and speaker volume seems good.
customer_reviews.text: Have not called in any Coyotes as of yet, but, unit seems to be a quality build and speaker volume seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Williams

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Chinese Christmas gift! It was a hit. My brother loves it and says that the sound quality is better than the one he paid 250.00 for! Very pleased! We are going to use it in West Texas this week.
customer_reviews.author: Hphillips

customer_reviews.title: This is my first call so I don't have anything ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first call so I don't have anything to compare it to. But it does what the manufactures say.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This unit works great - even beyond 150 yds
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great - even beyond 150 yds. Have only called crows, did bring in seven crows quickly. Easy to use and plenty loud enough! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: the sound is great, and the range is remarkable
customer_reviews.text: I used this call (along with the attachable decoy) during a coyote hunt this winter. We called in our first coyote within 10 minutes. The remote works very well, the sound is great, and the range is remarkable. Fun tool for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Bar X Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Make it Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Got lucky on this one. They delivered sooner than expected. And IT WORKS GREAT! Added my own neighbors dog barking so I can play it late at night as a prank. We prank each other all the time :)
customer_reviews.author: Sinbad

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: First call ever purchased and I bagged two coyotes in two outings. The supplied calls are very good along with a great remote. I shoot from an elevated stand and can watch them come to the call.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely rid your property of coyotes...by making them run from the call.
customer_reviews.text: With over two dozen coyotes found with a thermal imaging camera and within 1/4 mile of this device, their only response to the calls was to go away after slowly cycling through the standard calls included. Started with rabbit distress call since the area is overrun with them (why so many coyotes present). I'm now looking for more realistic calls. As a first time buyer of a call and with the reviews I read, I spent more to assure what I got would work. Not this time. If I hadn't gotten preoccupied with productive life activities, I would have sent this back Immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mesam Meme

customer_reviews.title: The call is great. Sound range and remote
customer_reviews.text: The call is great. Sound range and remote. But I am having a lot of difficulty on the ico tec sounds I can download I had to download a drop box and it has caused trouble with my computer so i will not be able to get the additional calls i want that is offered as well as adding pig calls. but the call itself is great
customer_reviews.author: tammie franke

customer_reviews.title: This was a great purchase for me
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase for me! While attempting to control predator growth and activity on our hunting property, we have found a new hobby. The device produces a loud and clear sound and is very realistic and accomplished kills on 90% of our hunting trips. The remote offers easy access at a very long range with the optional decoy attachment control. No issues at all and I have used this device several times without any issues in battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Gann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: lots of calls to call game in. I would purchase another one
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sauter

customer_reviews.title: I should have went ahead and spent the extra hundred ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have went ahead and spent the extra hundred dollars and got the next call this one's just not loud enough
customer_reviews.author: steve epley

customer_reviews.title: ... it ONE time for a couple of hours (in good weather). He put it back in the box ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend for Christmas and he used it ONE time for a couple of hours (in good weather). He put it back in the box (he's a bit OCD about his toys/tools) and stored on a table in his hunting room. He went to go coyote hunting again today (3 weeks since the last use) and found that the remote doesn't work at all. At first thought it was a bad battery, but also found that the A/B button as well as the AUX button does not work. The AUX button doesn't depress and the A/B button slides freely and is 'stuck' on A. USELESS after only ONE USE!!
customer_reviews.author: CarrCJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great call for the price. Remote is awesome. Can't wait to shoot some yotes!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty good device i quess
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my deer and moose hunting husband. It is a pretty good device i quess, the only thing that is disappointing is it is not really geared towards deer and moose. It would be absolutely wonderful if you would offer SD cards with preloaded sounds for purchase, as basically this unit is not of much use to him. Owls, geese, wolves, and crows? what would he need that for? He really liked it but he really would like to get more deer and moose calls for it, but i cannot seem to find any.
customer_reviews.author: danita

customer_reviews.title: Did the trick first time out.
customer_reviews.text: Volume is adequate, especially on howls/yips. Sounds are much more realistic than another brand of caller I had. Took it out and called in a coyote within 5 minutes using howls to bring him out and distressed rabbit to bring him in for kill shot. Ten minutes later in same area I called in two more with coyote distress and distressed rabbit, and got a kill shot on one of them. So far, so good for me. Not so much for the coyotes.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Ford

customer_reviews.title: It works but....
customer_reviews.text: My first issue is that the download feature does not work at all. The calls they have are limited in number if you can get them downloaded. The remote will not work in cold weather which makes this caller useless. In warmer weather (above 40 deg) the caller has decent volume and works fairly well. Spend the extra money and get a better caller.
customer_reviews.author: John  A. Prince

customer_reviews.title: lack of customer service at ICOTec
customer_reviews.text: bought a GC350 Electronic game call from ICOTec,,, the video on downloading new sounds is on a GC500,,,, it does not work on a GC350,, even when they refer you website to download new sounds,, not the same as in the video,, keeps asking for you to open a ICloud account to proceed,,, video does not require it,, i emailed their customer service over 2 weeks ago,, no response,,,, by trail and error i was able to download new sounds,,, nothing like their video and i did NOT have to open a ICloud account
customer_reviews.author: manuel34

customer_reviews.title: Terrific price and terrific product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who got his first moose permit. While it doesn't come with a moose call, he can either replace a call he won't use or download some on another sd card. The sounds that come with the call are very good.
customer_reviews.author: cared99

customer_reviews.title: Question to Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I first opened it and put in batteries, I get a message that says insert SD Card. The card is inserted. I get this message intermittently. About 30 percent of the time. When it works, it works great. How can I return this one in for one that works properly?
customer_reviews.author: DEAN LUNDBERG

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excited about this. Calls sound breast, price was good. I have enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Carcup8

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my husband and he loves ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and he loves it. He bought the PD200 decoy to go with it. One remote works for both.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried it but I love your reports about it and I think it will work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Icotec GEN2 GC350 Programmable Game Call - 24 Call Capacity
product_meta.description: The NEW GEN2 GC350 offers an outstanding remote technology, up to 300 yards with no line-of sight required to activate the main speaker unit. The ability for a hunter to remain still and camouflaged the best they can is crucial to being more successful at hunting keen predators. The remote control also has the ability to activate an electronic decoy that can plug into the main speaker unit, giving the hunter another edge over the predator. Suggested product ICOtec AD400 or PD200 decoy. Programmability is made easy with the NEW GEN2 GC350. All calls are loaded and played directly from a standard size Class4 SD Media Card. Any custom audio file saved as a .mp3 or a .wav (16 bit or less) file format can be played by the GEN2 GC350. ICOtec has an exclusive FREE audio call library that is accessible from our website. All free calls are encrypted and playable only by an ICOtec programmable caller. The unit requires 4 AA (1.5 volt batteries) and the remote requires one 23A 12 volt battery. BATTERIES NOT INCLUDED. USB connection cable is included. Windows PC computer downloads recommended. Light weight, compact, easy to operate, fantastic quality audio calls, very long range remote, low power consumption and one of the lowest prices available for a great programmable call. The ICOtec GEN2 GC350 is how predator calling was intended to be. Dead Serious!
feature_bullets: 300-yard remote range - no line of sight required
NEW call pause button (Pause and restart where the sound left off.)
NEW ON/OFF backlit buttons for night hunting
Free access to hundreds of professional sounds
